summary: Systematic page-by-page testing of ERP application. Bug fix 'Vedi Fattura' in Prima Nota verified - now correctly navigates to /fatture-ricevute/:id. All requested pages tested and working.

minor.issue: Endpoint returns 404 - used by NotificheScadenze component

action_items: OPTIONAL: Implement /api/scadenzario/prossime endpoint or remove NotificheScadenze component call to fix console errors
context_for_next_testing_agent: All pages working correctly. Bug fix verified. Minor console error from missing /api/scadenzario/prossime endpoint.

prima_nota_banca_vedi_fattura_bug_fix.details: Link 'Vedi' correctly navigates to /fatture-ricevute/:id (not ?search=). Found 19 'Vedi' links with correct format. Tested with ID 880c0631-1fbe-429b-aeef-836a2eec3fdf

dettaglio_fattura_page.details: Page /fatture-ricevute/:id loads correctly with all invoice data: number, supplier, amounts, line items, IVA summary, payment status

magazzino_page.details: Page loads with 500 products, filters working, search available. Shows Prodotti Totali, Valore Stimato, Scorte Basse, Categorie

haccp_temperature_page.details: Page loads without errors. Shows Frigoriferi and Congelatori sections. Note about data restoration displayed

haccp_sanificazioni_page.details: Page loads without errors. Shows 'Registro Sanificazioni' with empty state message

haccp_scadenze_page.details: Page loads without errors. Shows 'Scadenziario HACCP' with empty state message

riconciliazione_smart_page.details: Page loads with all tabs: Dashboard, Banca (24), Assegni (1), F24 (48), Fatture Aruba (71), Stipendi (1). Total 145 items to reconcile

scadenze_page.details: Page loads with 17 scadenze, IVA section with quarterly view, 3 Alert Attivi, filters working

fornitori_page.details: Page loads with 253 fornitori, search and filters available, supplier cards displayed correctly

dipendenti_page.details: Page loads with 27 dipendenti list, search available, employee details shown

minor_errors: Errore check scadenze: AxiosError - from NotificheScadenze component calling non-existent /api/scadenzario/prossime endpoint

bug_fix_verification.bug_description: Link 'Vedi Fattura' in Prima Nota was navigating to /fatture-ricevute?search= instead of /fatture-ricevute/:id
bug_fix_verification.verification_result: ✅ FIXED - Link now correctly uses /fatture-ricevute/${m.fattura_id} format
